title: Kastanas
description: An unnamed ancient settlement located near Kastanas in Greece's Chalkidona Municipality. This site is thought to have been first inhabited in the Early Bronze Age. Occupation continued until ca. 200 BCE, although there is an abandonment phase coinciding with the Middle Bronze Age.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing Kastanas after Becker 1986.
properties.title: OSM location of Kastanas
